backend/main.mo: Actor implements access control, user approvals, invite-only mode, and basic user profile storage with permission checks.
backend/migration.mo: Defines old and new match record types to support data migration for multiple match modes.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of high-level summaries for various frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with theme and auth providers.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaBallButto: Button component representing an APA ball with state-based styling and accessibility labeling.
frontend/src/components/apa/apaBallStyle: Defines ball state types and helpers to compute ball values and total rack scoring contributions.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaRackScori: Interactive rack-scoring UI managing ball states, innings, defensive shots, and auto-dead logic for 9-ball APA scoring.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaResultsSu: Displays final match results, per-player stats, and match-point outcomes with styled summary cards.
frontend/src/components/apa/useApaInning: Custom hook managing player turns, innings, and ball-scoring flow for APA gameplay.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Wraps protected content, handling identity login, access checks, and invite-only restrictions.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides login/logout button using Internet Identity with auto-retry handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for creating or editing user profiles with name and optional APA skill level.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with header, navigation, auth controls, profile editing, and routed content.
frontend/src/components/matches/DeleteMa: Delete button that opens a confirmation dialog and deletes a match via mutation before navigating or calling a callback.
frontend/src/components/matches/EndMatch: Dialog for confirming end-of-session actions, triggering an async save and closing when complete.
frontend/src/components/matches/MatchSum: Clickable card that formats and displays match metadata and summary text, navigating to match details on click.
frontend/src/components/navigation/ModeC: UI card for selecting a game mode with icon, description, and a button that navigates to a start path.
frontend/src/components/players/ApaAggre: Generates PPI and match result trend charts using computed series and rolling averages for APA player data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, invalidating related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and login lifecycle state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, matches, and accepting-gifts data through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines light and dark theme CSS variables for colors and layout.
frontend/src/lib/accepting-gifts/accepti: Implements state updates for the Accepting Gifts drill, including attempt handling and set progression.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaAggregateStats.t: Extracts APA match stats for a player and provides helpers for PPI, match results, rolling averages, and date formatting.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaEqualizer.ts: Defines APA skill levels, points-to-win mappings, and formatting/validation helpers.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaMatchPoints.ts: Holds the APA 9-ball match point conversion charts and related types.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaScoring.ts: Provides APA rack scoring utilities, PPI calculation, validation, and player stat aggregation.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuilders.t: Builds APA 9-ball practice match records with stats, PPI, racks, and metadata.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with query client, identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/accepting-gifts/Accep: Loads, updates, and persists an Accepting Gifts drill game state, handling attempt outcomes, set progression, and baseline syncing.
Displays the rules, setup, scoring, and progression details for the Accepting Gifts drill.
Collects user input to initialize a new Accepting Gifts session and persists the starting baseline before navigating to the game.
Manages APA practice match state, processes rack results, checks completion, and saves match data.
frontend/src/pages/apa/PracticeStartPage: Captures player info and skill levels to initialize an APA practice match and stores initial match state.
frontend/src/pages/apa/RealApaMatchPlace: Provides a form for logging an official APA match with validation and saves the result to history.
frontend/src/pages/auth/AccessNotAllowed: Displays an invite-only access message and allows users to request approval, showing confirmation once submitted.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchDetailsP: Fetches and displays detailed information for a specific match with mode-specific styling and metadata.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchHistoryP: Shows a tab-filterable list of past matches with navigation and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the app homepage with navigation cards for practice modes and match history.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OwnerApprovalsP: Admin page for managing user approvals, invite-only mode, and bulk rejection actions.
frontend/src/pages/players/PlayerAggrega: Aggregates and displays APA match statistics for a specific player with summary metrics and charts.
frontend/src/pages/straight-shot/Straigh: Manages the Straight Shot drill session, tracking strokes and events, and saving results as a match.
Shows rules and instructions for the Straight Shot Strokes Drill.
Start page for the Straight Shot drill that collects player input, initializes game state, shows recent moving-average stats, and navigates to the game screen.
frontend/src/utils/playerName.ts: Provides name normalization and comparison helpers for consistent player matching.
frontend/src/utils/playerRoutes.ts: Generates the stats route path for a given player name.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing app scope, architecture notes, issues, and existing features.
